alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 7:28PM CDT until June 13 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WEBSTER...NORTHWESTERN CADDO AND NORTHERN BOSSIER PARISHES... At 728 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ida, or 18 miles southeast of Atlanta, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Minden, Plain Dealing, Cotton Valley, Sarepta, Hosston, Rodessa, Ida, Evergreen, Rocky Mount, Bolinger, Ivan and Couchwood. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
